# GitHub Discussions Guide

Welcome to the Philly's RTS Toolkit discussion channels! This document outlines the different discussion categories available and how to use them effectively.

## Discussion Categories

### üì¢ Announcements
**Purpose:** Official announcements about releases, major updates, and important news  
**Who can post:** Maintainers  
**Format:** Read-only for most users, used for:
- New version releases
- Breaking changes or deprecations
- Community milestones
- Major feature announcements

---

### üí¨ General
**Purpose:** General conversations about the toolkit that don't fit other categories  
**Topics include:**
- Getting started questions
- General feedback
- Community discussions
- Off-topic RTS game design talk
- Success stories and experiences

---

### üé® Unit Design Showcase
**Purpose:** Share and discuss unit designs, get feedback, and inspire others  
**Topics include:**
- Sharing your custom unit statcards
- Unit balance discussions
- Historical or fictional unit recreations
- Requesting feedback on unit designs
- Tips and tricks for creating balanced units
- Unit design patterns and best practices

**Template for sharing:**
```markdown
**Unit Name:** [Your unit name]
**Category:** [Infantry/Armor/Air/Naval/etc.]
**Tier:** [Tier level]
**Description:** [Brief description]
**Design Philosophy:** [What were you trying to achieve?]
**Looking for feedback on:** [Specific areas]
**Screenshots/Export:** [Link or attach your statcard]
```

---

### ‚öîÔ∏è Weapons & Ballistics
**Purpose:** Discuss weapon systems, ammunition types, and ballistic calculations  
**Topics include:**
- Weapon template design
- Ammunition configuration and effects
- Ballistic calculations and realism
- Weapon balance questions
- Fire mode discussions (single shot, burst, full auto, etc.)
- Damage models and penetration mechanics
- Range and accuracy tuning

---

### üèõÔ∏è Formations & Nations
**Purpose:** Share and discuss organizational structures and nation designs  
**Topics include:**
- Formation composition strategies
- Nation hierarchy designs
- Doctrine and tactical organization
- Historical formation recreations
- Combined arms theory
- Tech trees and progression systems
- Faction asymmetry and uniqueness

---

### üí° Ideas & Feature Requests
**Purpose:** Suggest new features, improvements, and enhancements  
**Topics include:**
- New feature proposals
- UI/UX improvement suggestions
- New editor capabilities
- Export/import format ideas
- Integration with other tools
- Quality of life improvements

**When requesting features, please include:**
- Clear description of the feature
- Use case and benefits
- Examples or mockups if applicable
- Related existing features

---

### üîß Technical Support
**Purpose:** Get help with installation, bugs, and technical issues  
**Topics include:**
- Installation problems
- Runtime errors and crashes
- Data import/export issues
- WebView2 or .NET runtime issues
- Performance problems
- Database corruption or migration issues

**When asking for help, please provide:**
- Operating system and version
- .NET version and WebView2 runtime version
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Error messages or screenshots
- What you've already tried

---

### üë®‚Äçüíª Development & Contributing
**Purpose:** Discuss development topics, architecture, and contributions  
**Topics include:**
- Code architecture discussions
- Pull request discussions
- Development environment setup
- SQLite schema and database design
- TypeScript/C# implementation details
- Testing strategies
- Documentation improvements
- Localization and internationalization

---

### üìö Data Libraries
**Purpose:** Share and request unit, weapon, and formation libraries  
**Topics include:**
- Sharing complete unit libraries (JSON exports)
- Historical unit databases (WWII, Modern, Future, etc.)
- Weapon template collections
- Formation presets
- Nation configurations
- Collaborative data projects
- Data format standards and conventions

**When sharing data, please include:**
- Brief description of the library
- Time period/setting
- Number of units/weapons/formations
- Any dependencies or requirements
- License or usage terms
- Download link or attach JSON files

---

### üéØ Show & Tell
**Purpose:** Showcase projects, visualizations, and creative uses of the toolkit  
**Topics include:**
- Exported statcards and visualizations
- Integration with game engines or mods
- Automated workflows and scripts
- Custom export formats
- Radar charts and analytics
- Project showcases using the toolkit

---

### ‚ùì Q&A
**Purpose:** Ask and answer specific questions  
**Topics include:**
- How-to questions
- Best practices
- Clarification on features
- Tips and tutorials
- Workflow optimization

**Note:** Questions get marked with ‚úÖ when answered

---

## Discussion Guidelines

### General Rules
1. **Be respectful and constructive** - Everyone is here to learn and create
2. **Search before posting** - Your question might already be answered
3. **Stay on topic** - Use the appropriate category
4. **Provide context** - Include relevant details and examples
5. **Mark solutions** - Help others by marking helpful answers
6. **Share knowledge** - If you figured something out, share it!

### Best Practices
- Use clear, descriptive titles
- Format code and JSON with proper markdown
- Include screenshots when discussing UI
- Link to related discussions or issues
- Update your posts if you find solutions
- Thank people who help you

### What NOT to Post
- Spam or advertisements
- Off-topic content unrelated to RTS design
- Duplicate questions (search first!)
- Bug reports (use GitHub Issues instead)
- Requests for illegal content or hacks
- Personal attacks or harassment

---

## Using Discussions Effectively

### For Users
1. **Start with General or Q&A** if unsure where to post
2. **Use Search** to find existing discussions
3. **Subscribe to categories** you're interested in
4. **Upvote** helpful discussions and answers
5. **Share your work** in Show & Tell or Design Showcase

### For Contributors
1. **Monitor Technical Support** for recurring issues
2. **Convert good ideas** from Ideas category to Issues
3. **Update documentation** based on common questions
4. **Share development updates** in Development category
5. **Engage with community feedback** constructively

---

## Getting Started Checklist

New to the toolkit? Here's a suggested path:

- [ ] Read the main [README.md](../README.md)
- [ ] Check out [Technical Support](#-technical-support) for installation help
- [ ] Browse [Unit Design Showcase](#-unit-design-showcase) for inspiration
- [ ] Ask questions in [Q&A](#-qa) or [General](#-general)
- [ ] Share your first design in [Show & Tell](#-show--tell)
- [ ] Join ongoing discussions in topics that interest you

## Category Summary Table

| Category | Purpose | Who Posts | Response Expected |
|----------|---------|-----------|-------------------|
| Announcements | Official news | Maintainers | Read-only |
| General | Open discussion | Everyone | Community |
| Unit Design Showcase | Share units | Everyone | Feedback |
| Weapons & Ballistics | Weapon systems | Everyone | Discussion |
| Formations & Nations | Organization | Everyone | Discussion |
| Ideas & Feature Requests | Suggestions | Everyone | Consideration |
| Technical Support | Help needed | Everyone | Solutions |
| Development & Contributing | Code/dev topics | Contributors | Collaboration |
| Data Libraries | Share data | Everyone | Downloads |
| Show & Tell | Showcase work | Everyone | Appreciation |
| Q&A | Specific questions | Everyone | Answers |

---

## Need More Help?

- **Can't find the right category?** Post in [General](#-general)
- **Have a bug to report?** Use [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/PhillipWeidenhubler/Philly-s-RTS-Toolkit/issues)
- **Want to contribute code?** See [Development & Contributing](#-development--contributing)
- **Just want to chat?** Join [General](#-general) discussions

---

**Remember:** Discussions are for conversation and collaboration. For bug reports and feature tracking, use GitHub Issues. For code contributions, use Pull Requests.

Happy designing! üéÆ‚öîÔ∏è
